add(uint256).details: Adds a specific value to the counter.

current().details: Returns the current value of the counter.

decrement().details: Decrements the counter by 1 and returns the new value. Reverts if the counter would become negative.

increment().details: Increments the counter by 1 and returns the new value.

set(uint256).details: Sets the counter to a specific value.

subtract(uint256).details: Subtracts a specific value from the counter. Reverts if the result would be negative.
